entry.title: Red Flag Warning issued July 16 at 2:50PM PDT until July 17 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...DRY, WINDY CONDITIONS INTO MONDAY... .The passage of a dry cold front will break down the hot ridge of high pressure and bring critical fire conditions to much of central and eastern Washington through Monday.
